title: Barbecued Portobello Burgers
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 portobello mushrooms caps', '4 slices mozzarella or Taleggio cheese (optional)']
